#Annotations and summaries

##Title: Epigenetics and plant genome evolution
##Authors: Concepcion M Diez, Kyria Roessler and Brandon S Gaut
##Read and annotated on 10/7/2018
##Summary:
* This is a review article summarizing current knowledge of the relationship between methylation of genes and TEs and gene expression. 
* Methylation is a form of epigenetic effect where a methyl group is added to the 5th position of the cytosine ring (C base) of DNA.
